affirm: We are all works in progress.
The only constant in life is change.
Celebrate every win, no matter how small.
Start today with a grateful heart.
LIfe is too short to feel like crap.
Have the courage to live life the way you want to.
You are capable of amazing things.
Don't be the same. Be better. Everyday.
Make the most out of it.
Create your own sunshine. Be proud of it.
Say what you mean. Mean what you say.
Be brave enough to start a conversation that matters.
It's better to have JOMO. Joy Of Missing Out.
